characterCards.name: Aether
characterCards.description: Aether commands the upper sky, controlling air and cosmic insight.

characterCards.name: Amphitrite
characterCards.description: Amphitrite is the queen of the sea, using powerful water-based healing magic.

characterCards.name: Aphrodite
characterCards.description: Aphrodite is over this. She can cast ultra love attacks in her sleep.

characterCards.name: Apollo
characterCards.description: Apollo is the radiant god of music and prophecy, striking with fiery insight.

characterCards.name: Ares
characterCards.description: Ares thrives in battle, bringing destruction with his fiery and earthen fury.

characterCards.name: Artemis
characterCards.description: Artemis, the huntress, swiftly strikes her foes with precision and agility.

characterCards.name: Athena
characterCards.description: Athena, the goddess of wisdom, uses strategy and insight to outmaneuver foes.

characterCards.name: Atlas
characterCards.description: Atlas, the titan of endurance, bears the weight of the heavens with unyielding strength.

characterCards.name: Asterion
characterCards.description: Asterion, the mighty Minotaur, crushes enemies with his sheer brute force.

characterCards.name: Astraeus
characterCards.description: Astraeus, the dusk-bringer, channels celestial wisdom to guide destiny.

characterCards.name: Chronos
characterCards.description: Chronos controls the passage of time, ensuring his strikes land at the perfect moment.

characterCards.name: Coeus
characterCards.description: Coeus, the pillar of intellect, empowers his allies with wisdom and strategic foresight.

characterCards.name: Cronus
characterCards.description: Cronus, the tyrant of time, wields immense power to reshape fate itself.

characterCards.name: Demeter
characterCards.description: Demeter nurtures the land, bringing life and abundance wherever she treads.

characterCards.name: Dionysus
characterCards.description: Dionysus, the wild reveler, intoxicates foes and inspires allies alike.

characterCards.name: Eileithyia
characterCards.description: Eileithyia, goddess of childbirth, bestows healing and renewal upon her allies.

characterCards.name: Eos
characterCards.description: Eos, the dawn-bringer, races across the sky, lighting the way for victory.

characterCards.name: Erebus
characterCards.description: Erebus, lord of primordial darkness, cloaks the battlefield in shadow.

characterCards.name: Eris
characterCards.description: Eris thrives in chaos, sowing discord and striking when least expected.

characterCards.name: Eros
characterCards.description: Eros, the playful archer of love, enchants and manipulates his foes.

characterCards.name: Gaia
characterCards.description: Gaia, the primordial mother, shapes the very foundation of existence.

characterCards.name: Ganymede
characterCards.description: Ganymede, the divine cupbearer, radiates celestial charm and fortune.

characterCards.name: Hades
characterCards.description: Hades rules the underworld, wielding dark earth and insight magic.

characterCards.name: Harpies
characterCards.description: The Harpies strike from the skies with relentless speed and chaos.

characterCards.name: Hebe
characterCards.description: Hebe, the goddess of youth, restores vitality and strength.

characterCards.name: Hecate
characterCards.description: Hecate, the goddess of magic, weaves spells from the shadows.

characterCards.name: Hephaestus
characterCards.description: Hephaestus forges weapons of fire and stone with masterful precision.

characterCards.name: Helios
characterCards.description: Helios, the sun character, scorches enemies with celestial fire.

characterCards.name: Hera
characterCards.description: Hera, the queen of the gods, exerts divine authority and resilience.

characterCards.name: Heracles
characterCards.description: Heracles, the legendary hero, overpowers foes with sheer might.

characterCards.name: Hermes
characterCards.description: Hermes, the fleet-footed messenger, moves faster than the eye can see.

characterCards.name: Hestia
characterCards.description: Hestia, guardian of the hearth, brings warmth and protection.

characterCards.name: Hyperion
characterCards.description: Titan of light and celestial fire, Hyperion burns through the darkness with unmatched brilliance.

characterCards.name: Hypnos
characterCards.description: god of sleep, Hypnos lulls even the strongest warriors into a peaceful slumber.

characterCards.name: Iapetus
characterCards.description: A warrior among Titans, Iapetus is known for his brutal strength and tactical warfare.

characterCards.name: Iris
characterCards.description: Messenger of the gods and goddess of the rainbow, Iris bridges the realms with divine speed.

characterCards.name: Mnemosyne
characterCards.description: Titaness of memory, Mnemosyne grants divine wisdom to those who seek knowledge.

characterCards.name: Nemesis
characterCards.description: goddess of retribution, Nemesis ensures that hubris never goes unpunished.

characterCards.name: Nike
characterCards.description: goddess of victory, Nike grants triumph to those worthy of greatness.

characterCards.name: Nyx
characterCards.description: Primordial goddess of the night, Nyx holds dominion over the deepest shadows.

characterCards.name: Oceanus
characterCards.description: The Titan of the vast ocean, Oceanus nurtures and sustains all life through his endless tides.

characterCards.name: Pan
characterCards.description: The god of the wild, shepherds, and flocks, known for his playful and mischievous nature.

characterCards.name: Persephone
characterCards.description: The queen of the underworld and goddess of spring growth, embodying life and death.

characterCards.name: Phobos & Deimos
characterCards.description: Phobos & Deimos, the twins of fear, strike terror into their enemies.

characterCards.name: Phoebe
characterCards.description: Phoebe, the radiant Titaness, grants prophetic insight and celestial wisdom.

characterCards.name: Poseidon
characterCards.description: Poseidon rules the seas, causing tidal waves and earthquakes with his mighty trident.

characterCards.name: Rhea
characterCards.description: Rhea, the mother of the gods, nurtures and protects with unwavering strength.

characterCards.name: Selene
characterCards.description: Selene, goddess of the moon, illuminates the night with her divine glow.

characterCards.name: Tethys
characterCards.description: Tethys, the nourishing ocean goddess, grants life to all living beings.

characterCards.name: Thanatos
characterCards.description: Thanatos, the personification of death, moves swiftly to claim souls.

characterCards.name: Theia
characterCards.description: Theia, the goddess of sight, sees through deception and illuminates truth.

characterCards.name: Triton
characterCards.description: Triton, the herald of the seas, commands ocean waves with his mighty conch shell.

characterCards.name: Tyche
characterCards.description: Tyche, the goddess of fortune, grants luck to those she favors.

characterCards.name: Uranus
characterCards.description: Uranus, the primordial sky character, watches over the heavens with celestial might.

characterCards.name: Zeus
characterCards.description: Zeus, the king of the gods, wields thunderbolts and commands the skies.
